author: ET CONTRIBUTORS
title: Large caps should be initial beneficiaries, says Ravi Gopalakrishnan of Principal MF
description: The spread of the Covid-19 virus and the meltdown in oil prices. Both these factors have affected the market sentiment and contributed to the high volatility.
content: By Ravi GopalakrishnanWith the onset of 2020, two factors have led to the unprecedented corrections in stock markets globally. One, the spread of the Covid19 virus. Two, the meltdown in oil prices. Both these factors have affected the market sentiment and con… [+4123 chars]
